project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a simple quiz game in Python that asks the user multiple-choice questions, tracks the score, and displays it at the end.

task.name: Define the questions and answers in a variable
Implement the function to display questions and handle user input
Implement the scoring system to track correct answers
Implement a function to display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for the quiz game to verify the functionality
Execute tests on the quiz game to ensure correctness
